settings.content: We’re expanding our car key and remote catalog as quickly as possible, but we can still help. Scroll down for other options to get your spare key or fob.

settings.title: We’ve partnered with Car Key Express
settings.content: We’ve partnered with car keys express to give you an exclusive discount. We’re expanding our key catalog as quickly as possible, but in the meantime, let’s get you back out on the road. Fill out  the form above to learn more!

settings.title: Find a Locksmith Service
settings.content: We’ve got a direct line to meet your local locksmith needs. If you prefer the personal touch, just call our partner to be connected with a reliable local locksmith. It’s that simple — no stress, no hassle.

settings.title: Tom’s Key Beta Program
settings.content: To stay updated on our new offerings or to get early access to do-it-yourself solutions before they go live to the world, please share your vehicle and contact information below.

settings.title: What do I do if my car is not listed?
settings.content: Check back with us in the near future as we are constantly updating our site with new products. In the meantime, we’ve partnered with Car Keys Express for vehicles we don’t currently support. You can learn more about the partnership and get a 5% discount here.

Disclaimer: This free service assists vehicle owners in connecting with local service providers. All service providers are independent and Tom’s Key Company does not warrant or guarantee any service performed or product offered by service providers. It is the responsibility of the vehicle owner to verify that the hired provider furnishes the necessary skills, license, and insurance required (where applicable) for the work being performed. All persons depicted in a photo or video are actors or models and not actual service providers.

Affiliate Notice: Tom’s Key Company earns a commission on any purchases made through third party service providers.
